title: Atlassian
meta_description: A visual helper for the 2 requirements needed for Atlassian products passwords on their websites and mobile apps.

sections.name: Requirements
shortcuts: Must be between 8 and 100 characters long
Must contain a mix of letters and numbers

sections.name: Additional Info
shortcuts: Atlassian uses an entropy score to determine password strength. Simple passwords like asdf or password1 will be branded as weak. Your account admin may also have set a separate password policy.
